EmailTemplate.name: GSMLS Introduction
EmailTemplate.subject: IDX Introduction - GSMLS - {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
It's great to e-meet you! My name is [Coordinatorâ€™s Name] and I am an IDX Coordinator at Luxury Presence! I'm contacting you to start the MLS paperwork process! In order for us to display IDX data on your website, Contact: MLS Board Name requires us to have a data access agreement signed.
To get started on the data access agreement please follow the step-by-step instructions linked here: GSMLS Instructions
Let me know if you have any questions. I'm here to help!
Best Regards,
